          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els instruments de l'orquestra</string>
            <string language="en">The instruments of the orchestra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Instrumente des Orchesters</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les instruments de l'orchestre</string>

          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Informació sobre els instruments de l'orquestra i activitats (entreteniments musicals) sobre els instruments i els músics de l'orquestra.</string>
            <string language="en">Information on the instruments of the orchestra and activities (musical divertimentos) on instruments and musicians.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über die Instrumente des Orchesters
und der Aktivitäten (musikalische Divertimentos) auf Instrumenten und
Musikern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'information sur les instruments de l'orchestre

musiciens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Informação nos instrumentos do orchestra e das

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Le informazioni sugli strumenti dell'orchestra e

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πληροφορίες για τα όργανα της ορχήστρας και 
δραστηριότητες (μουσικά divertimentos) στα όργανα και τους 
μουσικούς.</string>
          </description>
